properties.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains; Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 3:47AM MST until January 8 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches.

* WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce,
Dixie, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Highway 93
Sula to Lost Trail Pass, and Lolo Pass.

* WHEN...Until 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ this evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ THIS EVENING
